name: Cylum Finance
description: Cylum is a protocol designed to facilitate the construction of NFT and Meterverse projects on the Binance Smart Chain, as well as partnerships and funding. The CYM token is used to power and drive this ecosystem. In addition to our reward system, we have a unique lock-stake algorithm that provides each token holder with a reward of up to 400% annual percentage yield (APY) for staking $CYM.
